original_text: Then the Lord said to Jacob, ‘Go back to the land where your father and grandfather lived. Go back to your relatives. I will be with you there.’
korean_text: 여호와께서 야곱에게 이르시되 네 조상의 땅 네 족속에게로 돌아가라 내가 너와 함께 있으리라 하신지라

sentences.original_text: Then the Lord said to Jacob
where your father and grandfather lived.
I will be with you there.'
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그곳에서 너와 함께 있을 것이다'
